page.title: 05Work in Ceres and Pitscottie
page.content:
Most people travel out of the area to work and many are in jobs which are related to agriculture. The number unemployed is small and most people enjoy their work.
There were divided views on whether new industries should be introduced into our area. Some people suggested that other industries related to agriculture should be introduced. Some suggested craft or cottage industries but most people wanted the area to remain as it is at present because they said they enjoyed the beauty of the countryside.
Those who travel to work outside the area have chosen to stay here because of the picturesque villages and pleasant surroundings.
